--- title: Plotting keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Plotting utilities" ---

highlight_edges[source]

highlight_edges(G, edges, ax, pos, node_size=300)

Draws the graph G with edges in edges drawn in red

highlight_edges_grapht[source]

highlight_edges_grapht(G, edges, pos)

G and pos need to be in graph_tool format

heatmap[source]

heatmap(df, x, y, hue, xbins=15, ybins=15, xlim=None, ylim=None, bin_numbers=False, bin_cutoff=1, rounding=3, ax=None, vmin=None, vmax=None, cbar=True)

Plots a heatmap binning the df data based on columns x and y

Layouts¶

Gives layouts in graph_tool format, the functions can take either graph_tool or networkx graphs

sfdp_layout[source]

sfdp_layout(G)

neato_layout[source]

neato_layout(G)

fdp_layout[source]

fdp_layout(G)

Helper functions¶

get_graph_tool_graph[source]

get_graph_tool_graph(G)

get_networkx_graph[source]

get_networkx_graph(G)

nxpos_to_graphtpos[source]

nxpos_to_graphtpos(G, nx_pos)

Takes a graph G (networkx or graph_tool) and a position dictionary and returns a graph_tool graph and VertexPropertyMap for plotting
